General.Name: Fujian Zhangzhou Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Fujian Zhangzhou Development Co.,Ltd. primarily engages in automobile trading business in China. It is also involved in the water affairs, sewage treatment, and real estate businesses, as well as hydraulic engineering. The company formerly known as Fujian Shining Group Co., Ltd. Fujian Zhangzhou Development Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Zhangzhou, China.
